itunes:title: Episode 319 - Full Stomach, Empty Balls
title: Episode 319 - Full Stomach, Empty Balls
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by beer connoisseur "Harry" as he discusses what it's like running the largest beer and wine publications in the nation, and what it was like being stabbed by a stripper with a broken win...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by beer connoisseur "Harry" as he discusses what it's like running the largest beer and wine publications in the nation, and what it was like being stabbed by a stripper with a broken wine glass.  Yup.  You read that right.  Wild show.

Buy Ross' New Book on Audible "When Darkness Falls, He Doesn't Catch It" https://www.amazon.com/When-Darkness-Falls-Doesnt-Catch/dp/B07H5P5BY7/ref=tmm_aud_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&qid=1533268712&sr=1-1
